## Import data
```{r}
# Change file extension
# path <- "./data/data/"
# old_names <- list.files(path)
# new_names <- gsub(".1D", ".csv", old_names)
# file.rename(paste0(path, file_names), paste0(path, new_names))

# Import data
dat1 <- fread("./data/data/CMU_a_0050642_rois_dosenbach160.csv", select = c(1:160))

library(pcalg)
library(corrplot)
set.seed(2022)

indepTest <- gaussCItest
suffStat <- list(C = cor(dat1[,1:40]), n = nrow(dat1[,1:40]))
pc.est <- pc(suffStat, indepTest, alpha = 0.5, p = 40, 
             m.max = 1, verbose = FALSE)
corrplot(pc.est@pMax)

pc.est_2 <- pc(suffStat, indepTest, alpha = 0.05, p = 40,
               m.max = 1, verbose = FALSE)
corrplot(pc.est_2@pMax)
```
